text: The Democratic Socialist Party of Greece ( Demokratiko Sosialistiko Komma Ellados) was a political party founded by George Papandreou in 1935. It took part in the 1946 elections, but was unsuccessful. The party split from the Liberal Party. It was replaced in 1950 with the formation of the Georgios Papandreou Party. title: Democratic Socialist Party of Greece
